name: Parmigiana
description: Parmigiana di melanzane - an Italian dish made with fried, sliced eggplant layered with cheese and tomato sauce, then baked.

name: Bistecca alla Fiorentina
description: Italian steak made of young steer (vitellone) or heifer (scottona) that, combined with the specific preparation, makes it one of the most popular dishes of Tuscan cuisine.

name: Prosciutto di Parma
description: An Italian uncooked, unsmoked, and dry-cured ham served thinly slice.
